thread.title: Book Nook by Vic Mickunas
thread.title_full: Book Nook by Vic Mickunas | www.daytondailynews.com

author: Vick Mickunas
title: Book Nook by Vic Mickunas
text:
Halloween draws nigh. The jack o’ lanterns will be flickering. The wind will rattle the shutters. Doors will creak. Ghosts, banshees, and other haunted things will be moaning in the mist. Well, perhaps. If you have been reading “The Victorian Book of the Dead,” the latest spine tingling offering from the Beavercreek writer Chris Woodyard then you are more than likely to be imagining such spooky things.
Woodyard’s prodigious output of chilling tales has distinguished her over the years as our regional grande dame of the macabre. Her diligent pursuit of ghost tales has taken her to every dark nook and creepy corner of our state. She’s probably best known for her scary good “Haunted Ohio” series. During the month of October subscribers to this newspaper can log on to our website to peruse some “Haunted Ohio” excerpts.
Continue reading on MyDaytonDailyNews.com. »
